title: Trump plans crackdown on Somali communities in Minnesota: What we know
description: US president has fixated on the large Somali community in Minnesota in recent weeks, making disparaging remarks.
content: US President Donald Trump launched a verbal attack on Somali immigrants on Tuesday, as federal authorities prepared to launch a major immigration crackdown targeting hundreds of undocumented Somalis … [+11537 chars]
